start.description: You find yourself standing in front of a forked road. There are two paths, one to the left and one to the right.

leftPath.description: You follow the left path and arrive at a beautiful lake.

choices.option: Go back to the forked road

rightPath.description: You follow the right path and find a mysterious cave.

choices.option: Go back to the forked road

swimInLake.description: You enjoy swimming in the lake and feel refreshed. Time to continue your adventure!

choices.option: Go back to the forked road

enterCave.description: As you enter the cave, you find a treasure chest!

choices.option: Leave the treasure chest and exit the cave

openChest.description: You open the treasure chest and find a beautiful gem! Congratulations on completing the adventure!
